release_info.name: Version 2.0.0
release_info.body:
Latest development version from main branch.

Latest commit: a43fa64
Date: 2025-10-28T19:45:07Z
Message: Add onboarding flow and profile management UI

Introduces a first-time onboarding process to guide users through creating their own profile, with a dedicated onboarding UI in main_window.py. Refactors profile storage to separate 'my_profile' and 'peer_profiles' in config_manager.py, adds profile management methods, and updates the main window to support profile creation, selection, and management. Updates assets, documentation, and build configuration to support new features and icons.
